title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Jan 30 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Jan 30 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Looks like GOP has votes to stop witnesses. Dems to appeal to Roberts. Roberts forbids whistleblower's name to be read in question. Trump knows how to deal with bullies. The only thing the left understands is force. Dems will melt if GOP stands firm. Schiff will be exposed by witnesses. Trump will win impeachment, just like he won Mueller. Hillary avoiding Tulsi lawsuit servers. Dems will fold, but huff and puff doing it. Koppel and Isaacson bemoan the "new normal”, think Trump won't leave office if he loses, compare USA to Nazi Germany. Meanwhile, life expectancy under Trump has gone up for the first time since 2014. Dems will be happy to see trial end, because they're losing. Mexico policing border. Old clips undermining Bolton's credibility. Mark Cuban: If Harry and Meghan play it right they can make a billion dollars. Schiff: No vindication without witnesses. Schiff in 2005: You can't trust Bolton.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

The slow strangulation of the Biden campaign. Vice President Pence calls Rush from Iowa to talk about the economy, trade, foreign policy, impeachment, more. Dems answer scripted questions at trial. Dershowitz destroyed Dems on Trump's motives. Schiff says Trump guilty of bribery and extortion, but they didn't put that in the articles. Trump lawyers, Judge Napolitano say it would cause a mistrial in a regular trial. America is worn out on impeachment. Sekulow tells Democrat senators they should be out campaigning. Roberts rejects Rand Paul again, Paul says it was about Obama role in coup against Trump.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Roberts censoring Rand Paul questions on whistleblower, Obama holdovers, conspiracy to create whistleblower complaint, trigger impeachment. Robert Ray agrees with Rush that yesterday's first question and answer sealed the deal for wobbly Republicans. Caller thinks Trump can win Virginia. How Schiff and his staff rigged the whistleblower system to get Trump, but Schiff denies he knows the whistleblower, Eric Ciaramella, and denies staff helped him. Crazy Bernie. WaPo gave Schiff four Pinnochios for saying he didn't know the whistleblower. Barr and Durham.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
